text: Splix is available for macOS, Windows and Linux. Download the desktop application bundle at [splix.org/#/download](https://splix.org/#/download).
Add Splix executable to your path. This step is not necessary, but is recommended if you want to use latest features which are not available in the user-interface.
This is an example command for macOS, and it will add Splix to your path, if your shell is [zsh](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Z_shell). Replace the user with your own username.
